STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_MONITOR_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG1 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_CHECK_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG6 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ERROR_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG3 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALARM_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG5 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ERRORS_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG3 = ?, COLUMN3 = ?, COLUMN_DATA = now() WHERE FLG2 = 1 AND COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ? and DATE_FORMAT(column_data,'%Y-%m-%d') like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ALARMS_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG5 = ?, COLUMN3 = ?, COLUMN_DATA = now() WHERE FLG4 = 1 AND COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ? and DATE_FORMAT(column_data,'%Y-%m-%d') like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_VIEWING_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG6 = ?, COLUMN3 = ?, COLUMN_DATA = now() WHERE COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ? and DATE_FORMAT(column_data,'%Y-%m-%d') like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_MONITOR_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET MONITOR_CHECK = ? , TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_CHECK_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET VIEWS_CHECK = ? , TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ERROR_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ERRORS_CHECK = ? , TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALARM_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ALARMS_CHECK = ? , TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ERRORS_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ERRORS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BATCH_AGENDE')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ALARMS_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ALARMS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BATCH_AGENDE')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_VIEWING_STATE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET VIEWS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BATCH_AGENDE')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ERRORS_STATE_BOOK
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ERRORS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BOOKING')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ALARMS_STATE_BOOK
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ALARMS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BOOKING')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_VIEWING_STATE_BOOK
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET VIEWS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') where ID_SERVICE =(SELECT ID_SERVICE FROM SERVICE WHERE NAME ='BOOKING')

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALARM_STATE_BOOK
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ALARMS_CHECK = ? , TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPD_ERROR_STATE_PINGSCO
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ERRORS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = SUBSTR(?,INSTR(?,'|',1,1)+1)

STATEMENT.name: UPD_ALARM_STATE_PINGSCO
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET ALARMS_CHECK = ? , USER_ID = ?, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = SUBSTR(?,INSTR(?,'|',1,1)+1)

STATEMENT.name: UPD_PROCESS_DATE_PINGSCO
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE SERVICE_INSTANCE SET USER_ID = ?, ENDDATE = SYSDATE, TS_UPDATE = to_timestamp(to_char(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ID_SERVICE_INSTANCE = SUBSTR(?,INSTR(?,'|',1,1)+1)
